name: NEFilterSocketFlow
desc: A flow of network data that the filter examines.

items.name: var remoteEndpoint: NWEndpoint?
items.desc: An object containing details about the socket’s remote endpoint.

items.desc: An object containing details about the socket’s local endpoint.

items.name: var socketFamily: Int32
items.desc: The protocol family of the socket.
